verses.name: Joshua 19:1
verses.text: And the second lot came forth to Simeon, even for the tribe of the children of Simeon according to their families: and their inheritance was within the inheritance of the children of Judah.

verses.name: Joshua 19:2
verses.text: And they had in their inheritance Beer–sheba, Sheba, and Moladah,

verses.name: Joshua 19:3
verses.text: And Hazar–shual, and Balah, and Azem,

verses.name: Joshua 19:4
verses.text: And Eltolad, and Bethul, and Hormah,

verses.name: Joshua 19:5
verses.text: And Ziklag, and Beth–marcaboth, and Hazar–susah,

verses.name: Joshua 19:6
verses.text: And Beth–lebaoth, and Sharuhen; thirteen cities and their villages:

verses.name: Joshua 19:7
verses.text: Ain, Remmon, and Ether, and Ashan; four cities and their villages:
